SUBJECTIVE:


Patient is a  45   year  old    female    with    no significant PMH who  presents  with   palpitations.




Started    3   hours    ago.    Denies    chest     pain.




OBJECTIVE:


BP   118/72      HR   142    irregular     RR  16     SpO2   98%


Exam:    Alert.    Irregular   rhythm.    No   murmurs.    Lungs   clear.




ASSESSMENT:

New  onset  atrial  fibrillation


PLAN:

Rate  control  with  metoprolol
Anticoagulation  -  calculate  CHA2DS2-VASc
Cardiology  follow  up
